about: An experienced animation layout artist skilled in Python for workflow optimization, currently transitioning to become a developer. Passionate about merging creativity with coding to craft visually compelling and functional digital experiences.

experiences.title: Layout Artist
experiences.description: Basically, I work with photo composition in animation projects. I've also started learning Python coding to create some tools for intuitive production work.

experiences.title: Lead Layout
experiences.description: I led the team and developed tools for the production pipeline. Additionally, I began learning web development during this period.

projects.title: Layout Tools
projects.description: Tools and scripts for layout/animation production in Autodesk Maya, utilizing Python 2.7.

projects.description: A CLI turn-based game project for learning the concepts of OOP in Python.
